article:
Mr. and Mrs. Brown were teachers. They lived in a big  _  .Last year they went to the countryside for their summer vacation. They _  it very much because it was a quite clean place.
One day they went for a  _  3  in the morning and saw an old man. He sat in the  _  sun in front of his house. Mr.Brown went to him and asked, "Do you like  _  in this quiet place?"
The old man answered, "Yes, I  _  ."
Mr. Brown asked, "What are the  _  things about it?"
The old man answered "Well,  everyone  here knows each other  well. They often come to see me, and I often go to visit  _ , too. Also, there are lots of children here."
Mr. Brown said, "That's interesting. Well, _   are the bad things?"
The old man thought for a short time and said, "Well, the same things."
